description: SAP NetWeaver AS JAVA (Customer Usage Provisioning Servlet), versions - 7.31, 7.40, 7.50, allows an attacker to read some statistical data like product version, traffic, timestamp etc. because of missing authorization check in the servlet.

product.name: SAP NetWeaver AS for JAVA (Customer Usage Provisioning Servlet)
